title: Superman The Movie 1978 extended 1080p H.264 mkv
description:
The enduring adventure spanning the Man of Steel's life, from his Krypton infancy and Midwest boyhood to his career as Daily Planet reporter Clark Kent, and through his titanic struggle with archnemesis Lex Luthor.

MKV created from a blu ray with 8 minutes of extra footage. You see the gauntlet scene where Lex Luthor shoots bullets, fire, and ice at Superman. I also included the deleted scene "Otis, feed the babies" where he drops a slab of meat into a pit of unseen large cats that I downloaded from youtube.  Enjoy and help seed.  Comments welcome.
